articles.title: The First 12 Reality Stars Eliminated Revealed
articles.description: 'The Challenge: CBS' has already begun filming, reportedly in Argentina. 12 reality stars have already been eliminated from the competition.
articles.content:

articles.title: Argentines mourn Falklands fallen on war's anniversary
articles.description: President Alberto Fernández has reiterated Argentina’s claim to the Falklands Islands while commemorating the troops who fell in the failed attempt to reclaim them.
articles.content: Candles illuminate crosses on a field during an event to remember the Argentinean soldiers who died during the Falklands or Malvinas War, marking the 40th anniversary of the war between Argentina and Great Britain over the remote South Atlantic archi... [2719 chars]

articles.content:

articles.title: World Cup Brazil Argentina Uruguay Ecuador learn foes
articles.description: Brazil, Argentina, Uruguay, and Ecuador have learned their path toward World Cup glory. Here's what to expect from South America's four sides.
articles.content: Twenty years have gone by since South America last got its hands on the World Cup. Since then, strikingly, every Brazil campaign has ended as soon as they have come up against European opposition in the knockout rounds. And though Argentina got past ... [6391 chars]

articles.title: England's route to 2022 World Cup final in Qatar
articles.description: Englands route to World Cup glory could pit them against Senegal, France, Belgium and Brazil if they finish as group winners at Qatar 2022; Netherlands, Argentina, Brazil and France potential route to final if they finish as runners-up in Group B
articles.content:
The draw for the 2022 World Cup in Qatar has been made, and England's path to glory has been mapped out - but who stands between Gareth Southgate's side and the greatest prize of all?

articles.title: Argentina's Lionel Scaloni has 'no complaints' over World Cup draw
articles.description: DOHA: Argentina coach Lionel Scaloni said on Friday that his team's World Cup draw might have been far worse, with Mexico, Poland, and Saudi Arabia put together.
